name: enre-marker
description: ENRE-marker is a tool for manually label truth entities and relations analysed by well-known tools.

scripts.compile:dev: concurrently "cd src/extension && npm run compile:dev-w" "cd src/webview && npm run compile:prod" "npm run start:mock"
scripts.compile:dev-no-mock: concurrently "cd src/extension && npm run compile:dev-w" "cd src/webview && npm run compile:prod"
scripts.compile:prod: concurrently "cd src/extension && npm run compile:prod" "cd src/webview && npm run compile:prod"
